sentences.cn: 一本极有影响力的艺术杂志

sentences.en: And, lest we forget, Einstein wrote his most influential papers while working as a clerk.
sentences.cn: 大家不要忘记，爱因斯坦最有影响力的论文还是当文员的时候写的。

sentences.en: Chaplin was not just a genius, he was among the most influential figures in film history.
sentences.cn: 卓别林不仅仅是天才，也是电影史上最有影响力的人物之一。

sentences.en: Cubism is the most influential of all modern art movements.
sentences.cn: 立体派是现代艺术运动中最有影响力的流派。

sentences.en: He always tries to get in with the most influential people.
sentences.cn: 他总是试图巴结最有影响的人物.
他有一些有影响力的朋友。

sentences.en: He was one of the most influential perfor-mers of modern jazz.
sentences.cn: 他是现代爵士乐最有影响力的表演者之一。

sentences.en: I'm editor of the most influential newspaper in Riverdale.
sentences.cn: 我是Riverdale最有影响力的报纸的编辑.

sentences.en: In his day, he was a very influential politician.
sentences.cn: 他在走红时是非常有影响力的政治家.

sentences.en: Influential friends helped him to get a good job.
sentences.cn: 有权势的朋友们帮他弄到一份美差.

sentences.en: It helps to have influential friends.
sentences.cn: 有几个位高权重的朋友很有好处。

sentences.en: James always tries to get into ( with ) the most influential people.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯总是试图和最有影响的人交朋友.

sentences.en: The fact is influential in reaching a decision.
sentences.cn: 这一因素对做出决定是有影响的.

sentences.en: We can brainstorm a list of the most influential individuals in the company.
sentences.cn: 我们可以集体讨论，列出该公司中最有影响的人员的名单。

sentences.en: While Clements'work was widely influential, his classification has little current use.
sentences.cn: 虽然Clements的工作影响面很宽, 但它的分类未被普遍采用.

words.tran_cn: 影响；势力；感化；有影响的人或事

trans.tran_cn: 有影响力的，有支配力的
trans.tran_en: having a lot of influence and therefore changing the way people think and behave
